name: Witch Broom Adventure
description:
Oh no! You were all ready to go to the witch academy when you realize you don't have a broom! The only way to get to the school is by broom! What will you do? Follow this young witch as she ventures on a journey to different worlds in order to collect items to craft herself a new broom. With the help of a mysterious cat lady, you are set off on quest to get to witch academy by any means. 

Witch Broom Adventure is a simple 2D platformer while also involving some time based elements in order to complete the quests. 

Created by a student Solo Developer with assets taken from the Unity Asset Store with some including modification by said developer to create a more cohesive art style.

Thank you for taking the time to try my game out!

#SDCT
